Package infovis.visualization.ruler

Management of rulers that go around and under visualizations.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
DiscreteRulersBuilder Helper methods to create rulers for discrete values.
LinearRulersBuilder Class DiscreteRuler
RulerTable Class for managing rulers associated with a visualization.
RulerVisualization Display rulers under a Visualization.
 

Package infovis.visualization.ruler Description

Management of rulers that go around and under visualizations.
